meanings.sent1: She dandered when her brother teased her.
meanings.sent2: He dandered at the unfair treatment he received.
meanings.sent3: The cat dandered at the sight of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His temper dandered like a storm brewing in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience dandered thin as the students continued to misbehave.

meanings.sent1: The constant noise dandered her nerves.
meanings.sent2: His thoughtless comments dandered his friend.
meanings.sent3: The squeaky door dandered everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The unresolved issue dandered their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive music dandered the entire neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The dog dandered all over the couch.
meanings.sent2: Her cat dandered on her favorite sweater.
meanings.sent3: The dusty room dandered with allergens.
meanings.sent4: The old book dandered when it was opened after years.
meanings.sent5: The dry climate dandered his skin, causing discomfort.
